sentences.sContent: Only a short campaign took place in Puerto Rico, but after the war Spain ceded the island to America.
sentences.sCn: 波多黎各岛仅经历了一场短暂的战斗，但大战后西班牙把该岛割让给了美国。

trans.tranOther: to give something such as an area of land or a right to a country or person, especially when you are forced to
